Package be.helha.api_recettapp.services

Interface IRecipeComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
RecipeComponentServiceDB
public interface IRecipeComponent
Service interface for managing recipe components. Provides methods to retrieve, add, update, and delete recipe components.

This interface acts as the abstraction layer between the controller and the data access logic for RecipeComponent.

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • findRecipeComponentsByRecipeId

      List<RecipeComponent> findRecipeComponentsByRecipeId(int recipeId)
      Retrieves a list of recipe components that contain the specified recipe.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - the ID of the recipe for which the components need to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a list of RecipeComponent associated with the specified recipe.
